You determine that you could wear the leathers around your chest. The leathers appears to serve some purpose.

It looks like this item has been mainly crafted out of leather.

The creator has also provided the following information: Forest Armor may have either long and show descriptions. The details are as follows:

TIER 4

You will receive a greater awareness of your environmental surroundings. In addition, you will experience heightened sensitivity to the shadows, light, and darkness. Your survival instincts will become slightly elevated. And finally, you will react more intuitively to irregularities in the terrain. Your armor will occasionally call upon Wind Gust, Leaf Swirl, Mud Sling, and Woodland Empathy. Current verbs are: CLEAN, EXHALE, GAZE, KNOCK, PRAISE, PULL, REMOVE, RUB, SENSE, SHAKE, TICKLE, TURN, and WEAR.

Armor can only be activated outside, and spending time indoors will cause your deep stone grey leathers to return to its natural state. It will not function favorably in water.

This deep stone grey leathers is Tier 4 of 4 Tiers. Tier 4 is a rarer tier. Forest Armor was first released at Briarmoon Cove 2016.

You might be able to have a talented merchant lighten the deep stone grey leathers for you.
